input_file.description: Your path to file with hashes

hash_type.description:
Type of your hash for you programm.
For example '22000' (like in hashcat)

extra_flags.description:
You can add your own.
For example '--save-memory=1 --fork=100'

path_to_binary.description:
You can specify the path to your programm.
For example '/usr/bin/hashcat'
